sentences: Lahkume kohe, sest olukord on väljakannatamatu.
Tuleb aeg lahkuda siit kohestava ohtu tõttu.
Pärast pikka arutelu otsustasid nad lahkuda.
context: The Estonian word 'lahkuda' means to leave or depart from a place. It often implies leaving due to an intolerable situation, emergency, or when it's time to move on. The dictionary definition mentions that the situation becomes so unbearable that it's time to leave.
